productAttrList.attrValue:
display=(function(){\n
   return true;\n
  })\n
  #~#\n
  check=(function(){\n
   var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
   var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
         for(var i in arr){ \n
                var subarr = arr[i]; \n
                var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
                for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                       var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
                       if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                             var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
                             var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
                             var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
                             var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                }\n
         }\n
         //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
   if( PrdctType=="2"){\n
                alert("开放式产品,不允许转让");\n
                       return false;\n
   }\n
   else if(PrdctType=="1"){\n
                       if(FinStatusId!="5"){\n
                             alert("封闭式产品不在封闭期,不允许转让");\n
                             return false;\n
                       }\n
         }\n
         var trancode='400021';\n
         var arrTree=new Array();\n
          arrTree[arrTree.length]="productId="+productInfo.availableProduct.productId;\n
         arrTree[arrTree.length]="corePartyId="+customerInfo.custNo;\n
         itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);\n
         var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
         var totalAvailableShare = data.map.totalAvailableShare;\n
         if(totalAvailableShare<=0){\n
                alert("客户没有可用份额,无法进行转让");\n
         return false;\n
   }\n
         return true;\n
  })

(function(){ //理财产品转让 功能驱动\n
            var obj = {};\n
            obj.productId = productInfo.productMsgs.attrValue; //产品编号\n
            var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
                        for(var i in arr){ \n
                                    var subarr = arr[i]; \n
                                    if("960004" == subarr.productFeatureCategoryId){//1960001 理财产品 取产品风险等级\n
                                                            var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
                                                            for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                                                                        var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
                                                                        if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                                                                                    obj.intFlg = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                                                                        }\n
                                                            }\n
                                    }\n
                        }\n
            return obj; \n
            })

display=(function(){\n
   return true;\n
  })\n
  #~#\n
  check=(function(){\n
        var trancode='400020';                \n
    var arrTree=new Array();              \n
    arrTree[arrTree.length]="custNo="+customerInfo.custNo;        \n
    itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);     \n
    var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
    var hasAgreement = data.map.hasAgreement;\n
    var hastRiskEvaluation = data.map.hastRiskEvaluation;\n
    var isSignRiskAgreement = data.map.isSignRiskAgreement;\n
    var riskAsseType = data.map.riskAsseType;\n
    var riskGrade = data.map.riskGrade;\n
    var effDate = data.map.effDate;\n
    if(hastRiskEvaluation=="0"){\n
        alert("客户没有进行风险评估,请进行风险评估");\n
            return false;\n
      }\n
    if(effDate<tellerInfo.tradeDate){\n
      alert("客户风险评估日期"+effDate+"已失效,请重新进行风险评估");\n
        return false;\n
    }\n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    for(var i in arr){ \n
            var subarr = arr[i]; \n
        var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
        for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
          if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                    var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
            var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
          var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
          var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
        }\n
    }\n
    //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
    if(riskGrade< PrdctRskGrd){\n
        if(isSignRiskAgreement=="0"){\n
                alert("客户风险承受能力低于产品风险登记且没有签约风险约定书,请重新进行风险评估或签约风险约定书");\n
                return false;\n
            }\n
      }\n
      if( PrdctType=="1"){\n
        if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
            alert("封闭式产品不在发行期内,不允许购买");\n
            return false;\n
        }\n
    }\n
      else if(PrdctType=="2"){\n
            if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
                if(FinStatusId!="6"){\n
                    alert("开放式产品不在发行期且未开放,不允许购买");\n
                    return false;\n
        }\n
        else{\n
                    if(!(OpExcType.indexOf("1")>-1)){\n
                        alert("开放式产品开放允许交易不包含申购,不允许购买");\n
                        return false;\n
                    }\n
                }
            }\n
    }\n
    return true;\n
    })

(function(){ //理财产品购买 功能驱动\n
 var obj = {};\n
 obj.corePartyId =customerInfo.custNo; //客户号\n
 return obj; \n
})

  })\n
  #~#\n
  check=(function(){\n
        var trancode='400020';                \n
    var arrTree=new Array();              \n
    arrTree[arrTree.length]="custNo="+customerInfo.custNo;        \n
    itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);     \n

    var hasAgreement = data.map.hasAgreement;\n
    var hastRiskEvaluation = data.map.hastRiskEvaluation;\n
    var isSignRiskAgreement = data.map.isSignRiskAgreement;\n
    var riskAsseType = data.map.riskAsseType;\n
    var riskGrade = data.map.riskGrade;\n
    var effDate = data.map.effDate;\n
    if(hastRiskEvaluation=="0"){\n
        alert("客户没有进行风险评估,请进行风险评估");\n
            return false;\n
      }\n
    if(effDate<tellerInfo.tradeDate){\n
      alert("客户风险评估日期"+effDate+"已失效,请重新进行风险评估");\n
        return false;\n

    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n

            var subarr = arr[i]; \n
        var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
        for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
          if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                    var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
            var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
          var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
          var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
        }\n
    }\n
    //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n

      if( PrdctType=="1"){\n
        if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n

            return false;\n
        }\n
    }\n
      else if(PrdctType=="2"){\n
            if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
                if(FinStatusId!="6"){\n
                    alert("开放式产品不在发行期且未开放,不允许购买");\n

                       }\n

                             var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
                             var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
                             var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                }\n
         }\n
         //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
   if( PrdctType=="2"){\n
                alert("开放式产品,不允许转让");\n
                       return false;\n
   }\n
   else if(PrdctType=="1"){\n
                       if(FinStatusId!="5"){\n
                             alert("封闭式产品不在封闭期,不允许转让");\n
                             return false;\n
                       }\n
         }\n
         var trancode='400021';\n
         var arrTree=new Array();\n
          arrTree[arrTree.length]="productId="+productInfo.availableProduct.productId;\n
         arrTree[arrTree.length]="corePartyId="+customerInfo.custNo;\n
         itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);\n
         var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
         var totalAvailableShare = data.map.totalAvailableShare;\n
         if(totalAvailableShare<=0){\n
                alert("客户没有可用份额,无法进行转让");\n
         return false;\n
   }\n
         return true;\n
  })

(function(){ //理财产品转让 功能驱动\n
            var obj = {};\n

                                    var subarr = arr[i]; \n
                                    if("960004" == subarr.productFeatureCategoryId){//1960001 理财产品 取产品风险等级\n
                                                            var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
                                                            for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                                                                        var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
                                                                        if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                                                                                    obj.intFlg = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                                                                        }\n
                                                            }\n
                                    }\n
                        }\n
            return obj; \n
            })

display=(function(){\n
   return true;\n
  })\n
  #~#\n
  check=(function(){\n
        var trancode='400020';                \n
    var arrTree=new Array();              \n
    arrTree[arrTree.length]="custNo="+customerInfo.custNo;        \n
    itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);     \n
    var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
    var hasAgreement = data.map.hasAgreement;\n
    var hastRiskEvaluation = data.map.hastRiskEvaluation;\n
    var isSignRiskAgreement = data.map.isSignRiskAgreement;\n
    var riskAsseType = data.map.riskAsseType;\n
    var riskGrade = data.map.riskGrade;\n
    var effDate = data.map.effDate;\n
    if(hastRiskEvaluation=="0"){\n
        alert("客户没有进行风险评估,请进行风险评估");\n
            return false;\n
      }\n
    if(effDate<tellerInfo.tradeDate){\n
      alert("客户风险评估日期"+effDate+"已失效,请重新进行风险评估");\n
        return false;\n
    }\n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    for(var i in arr){ \n
            var subarr = arr[i]; \n
        var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
        for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
          if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                    var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
            var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
          var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
          var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
        }\n
    }\n
    //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
    if(riskGrade< PrdctRskGrd){\n
        if(isSignRiskAgreement=="0"){\n
                alert("客户风险承受能力低于产品风险登记且没有签约风险约定书,请重新进行风险评估或签约风险约定书");\n
                return false;\n
            }\n
      }\n
      if( PrdctType=="1"){\n
        if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
            alert("封闭式产品不在发行期内,不允许购买");\n
            return false;\n
        }\n
    }\n
      else if(PrdctType=="2"){\n
            if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
                if(FinStatusId!="6"){\n
                    alert("开放式产品不在发行期且未开放,不允许购买");\n
                    return false;\n
        }\n
        else{\n
                    if(!(OpExcType.indexOf("1")>-1)){\n
                        alert("开放式产品开放允许交易不包含申购,不允许购买");\n
                        return false;\n
                    }\n
                }
            }\n
    }\n
    return true;\n
    })

(function(){ //理财产品购买 功能驱动\n
 var obj = {};\n
 obj.corePartyId =customerInfo.custNo; //客户号\n
 return obj; \n
})

   return true;\n
  })\n
  #~#\n
  check=(function(){\n
        var trancode='400020';                \n
    var arrTree=new Array();              \n
    arrTree[arrTree.length]="custNo="+customerInfo.custNo;        \n
    itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);     \n
    var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
    var hasAgreement = data.map.hasAgreement;\n
    var hastRiskEvaluation = data.map.hastRiskEvaluation;\n
    var isSignRiskAgreement = data.map.isSignRiskAgreement;\n
    var riskAsseType = data.map.riskAsseType;\n
    var riskGrade = data.map.riskGrade;\n
    var effDate = data.map.effDate;\n
    if(hastRiskEvaluation=="0"){\n
        alert("客户没有进行风险评估,请进行风险评估");\n
            return false;\n
      }\n
    if(effDate<tellerInfo.tradeDate){\n
      alert("客户风险评估日期"+effDate+"已失效,请重新进行风险评估");\n
        return false;\n
    }\n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    for(var i in arr){ \n
            var subarr = arr[i]; \n
        var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
        for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
          if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                    var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
            var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
          var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
          var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
        }\n
    }\n
    //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
    if(riskGrade< PrdctRskGrd){\n
        if(isSignRiskAgreement=="0"){\n
                alert("客户风险承受能力低于产品风险登记且没有签约风险约定书,请重新进行风险评估或签约风险约定书");\n
                return false;\n
            }\n
      }\n
      if( PrdctType=="1"){\n
        if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
            alert("封闭式产品不在发行期内,不允许购买");\n
            return false;\n
        }\n
    }\n
      else if(PrdctType=="2"){\n
            if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
                if(FinStatusId!="6"){\n
                    alert("开放式产品不在发行期且未开放,不允许购买");\n
                    return false;\n
        }\n
        else{\n
                    if(!(OpExcType.indexOf("1")>-1)){\n
                        alert("开放式产品开放允许交易不包含申购,不允许购买");\n
                        return false;\n
                    }\n
                }
            }\n
    }\n
    return true;\n
    })

                for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                       var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
                       if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                             var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
                             var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
                             var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                       else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
                             var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
                       }\n
                }\n
         }\n
         //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
         if( PrdctType=="1"){\n
                alert("封闭式产品,不允许赎回");\n
                       return false;\n
   }\n
   else if(PrdctType=="2"){\n
                       if(FinStatusId!="6"){\n
                             alert("开放式产品不在开放期,不允许赎回");\n
                             return false;\n
                       }\n
                       else{\n
                       if(!(OpExcType.indexOf("2")>-1)){\n
                                    alert("开放式产品开放允许交易不包含赎回,不允许赎回");\n
                                    return false;\n
                             }\n
                       }\n
         }\n
         var trancode='400021';\n
         var arrTree=new Array();\n
          arrTree[arrTree.length]="productId="+productInfo.availableProduct.productId;\n
         arrTree[arrTree.length]="corePartyId="+customerInfo.custNo;\n
         itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);\n
         var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
         var totalAvailableShare = data.map.totalAvailableShare;\n
         if(totalAvailableShare<=0){\n
                alert("客户没有可用份额,无法进行赎回");\n
         return false;\n
   }\n
         return true;\n
  })

display=(function(){\n
   return true;\n
  })\n
  #~#\n
  check=(function(){\n
        var trancode='400020';                \n
    var arrTree=new Array();              \n
    arrTree[arrTree.length]="custNo="+customerInfo.custNo;        \n
    itemProductService.getQueryInfo(trancode,arrTree);     \n
    var data = itemProductService.dataBack;\n
    var hasAgreement = data.map.hasAgreement;\n
    var hastRiskEvaluation = data.map.hastRiskEvaluation;\n
    var isSignRiskAgreement = data.map.isSignRiskAgreement;\n
    var riskAsseType = data.map.riskAsseType;\n
    var riskGrade = data.map.riskGrade;\n
    var effDate = data.map.effDate;\n
    if(hastRiskEvaluation=="0"){\n
        alert("客户没有进行风险评估,请进行风险评估");\n
            return false;\n
      }\n
    if(effDate<tellerInfo.tradeDate){\n
      alert("客户风险评估日期"+effDate+"已失效,请重新进行风险评估");\n
        return false;\n
    }\n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    var arr = productInfo.productFeatureList; \n
    for(var i in arr){ \n
            var subarr = arr[i]; \n
        var tosubarr = subarr.productFeatureTypeList;\n
        for(var j in tosubarr){\n
                var totosubarr = tosubarr[j];\n
          if( "PrdctRskGrd" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品风险等级\n
                    var PrdctRskGrd = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "PrdctType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品类型1-封闭式2-开放式\n
            var PrdctType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "FinStatusId" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //产品状态2-发行6-开放\n
          var FinStatusId = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
          else if( "OpExcType" == totosubarr.productFeatureTypeId){ //开放允许交易\n
          var OpExcType = totosubarr.productFeatureList[0].productFeatureName;\n
          }\n
        }\n
    }\n
    //alert("产品风险等级="+PrdctRskGrd+"产品类型="+PrdctType+"产品状态="+FinStatusId+"开放允许交易="+OpExcType );\n
    if(riskGrade< PrdctRskGrd){\n
        if(isSignRiskAgreement=="0"){\n
                alert("客户风险承受能力低于产品风险登记且没有签约风险约定书,请重新进行风险评估或签约风险约定书");\n
                return false;\n
            }\n
      }\n
      if( PrdctType=="1"){\n
        if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
            alert("封闭式产品不在发行期内,不允许购买");\n
            return false;\n
        }\n
    }\n
      else if(PrdctType=="2"){\n
            if(FinStatusId!="2"){\n
                if(FinStatusId!="6"){\n
                    alert("开放式产品不在发行期且未开放,不允许购买");\n
                    return false;\n
        }\n
        else{\n
                    if(!(OpExcType.indexOf("1")>-1)){\n
                        alert("开放式产品开放允许交易不包含申购,不允许购买");\n
                        return false;\n
                    }\n
                }
            }\n
    }\n
    return true;\n
    })

(function(){ //理财产品购买 功能驱动\n
 var obj = {};\n
 obj.corePartyId =customerInfo.custNo; //客户号\n
 return obj; \n
})
